name: Reel Black Studios
description: A Black-owned creative animation studio run by husband and wife duo Dara King and Chris Fequiere, known for the short film "Burning Rubber" and other animations for brands, agencies, and TV studios

name: Bwa Studios
description: A Black female-owned studio that creates and produces programming and content for all platforms. They focus on building equity in the animation industry by consciously recruiting Black women, women of color, and nonbinary people of color

name: Lion Forge Entertainment
description: An Academy Award-winning animation and live-action studio founded by David Steward II, focused on authentic storytelling and celebrating diverse voices through comics, games, and animation

name: Black Women Animate (BWAS)
description: Founded by Taylor K. Shaw, this organization empowers Black women in animation and promotes diverse stories through creative services and training programs

name: Martian Blueberry
description: Co-founded by Love Barnett and Carl Jones, this animation powerhouse creates toons that resonate with communities, with a focus on diversity and inclusion. Carl Jones is known for his work on "The Boondocks" and "Black Dynamite."

name: Magic Carpet Studios
description: Founded by Ferdy Adimefe, this studio is committed to transforming human consciousness by putting authentic African stories on the global entertainment map, starting as a 2D animation studio and expanding into other forms

name: Small Town Animation Studios
description: Founded by Jermaine Hargrove, this Black-owned studio focuses on developing and producing 3D CGI feature film/TV animation for a global audience

name: Chaz Bottoms Animation Studios (CBA Studios)
description: Founded by Chaz Bottoms, this 2D animation studio in Los Angeles is committed to diversity and powerful storytelling, with clients including Disney and Apple TV

name: Animation TV
description: Launched by Jermaine and Whaketa Hargrove, this is the first Black-owned streaming animation network, aiming to introduce viewers to the versatility of animation and amplify unheard voices. It collaborates with Small Town Animation Studios
